name: HEALTHY HAVOC
description:
The Fatties are BACK!

 In this all new sequel to Fatty Fight, battle your way though numerous stages on single player or multiplayer survival!

 Try to fill out the EPIC veggiedex with all the veggies you discover on your adventures!

HOW TO PLAY:

Player 1 controls Wob with arrow keys!

Player 2 controls Nus with W,A,S,D!

 Eat junk food, collect veggies, and be the last chungus standing!
